meanings: (단추·이름표 등을) (몸에 붙이다) wear, attach, put on; (꿰매다) sew (sth on sth)
(쇠·돌 등이 뜨거워지다) become (red-)hot, be heated, heat up (=달아오르다)

vlive.korean: 달아? Is it sweet? 듣기 View video AB6IX : AB6IX 화이트데이
달아, 너는 왜 여기 있어? Dalgyum! Why are you here? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 토스트 먹방
이게 매력은 씹으면 씹을수록 굉장히 달아요 - 고소해요? The more you chew it, the sweeter it gets. - Is it good? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🐱🐹🐿🦋🍞🐰
vlive.english: The more you chew it, the sweeter it gets. - Is it good?

vlive.korean: 달아요? Is it sweet? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.14

examples.korean: He weighed himself on the bathroom scales. 발음듣기 그는 욕실 저울에 체중을 달아 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He weighed himself on the bathroom scales. 발음

examples.korean: Can I put it on my tab? 발음듣기 그거 제 장부에 달아 놓아도 되겠죠? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can I put it on my tab? 발음

examples.korean: Put it on my account please. 발음듣기 그거 내 거래 장부에 달아 둬요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Put it on my account please. 발음

examples.korean: Would you like to put that on your charge? 발음듣기 그거 거래 장부에 달아 드릴까요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Would you like to put that on your charge? 발음

examples.korean: Can you sew a button on for me? 발음듣기 내 옷에 단추 좀 달아 주겠니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can you sew a button on for me? 발음
